travelerInfo.title: Traveler Information
travelerInfo.initMsg: Before using this system, please click the "Traveler Information" button above to fill in your basic information to ensure the normal operation of this system.

document.title: Travel Documents Information
document.issurance: Please select the country/region of issuance of the travel document.
document.description: Please list the travel documents that the traveler wishes to use during the journey. You can add multiple records.
document.warning: You must fill in at least one record of travel document information.

searchBox.title: Search Box
searchBox.description: Please enter the departure and destination cities, and the system will recommend the most suitable flight itinerary for you.

placeholder.departure: Departure IATA Code or Airport Name
placeholder.destination: Destination IATA Code or Airport Name

searchBox.invalidInput: Please enter the correct IATA code or airport name and select the airport you need from the option list.

zh.title: 旅客飛航路線推薦系統

travelerInfo.title: 旅客資訊
travelerInfo.initMsg: 爲了保障本系統的正常運作，請於使用本系統之前，點擊上方「旅客資訊」按鈕塡寫閣下的基本資料。

document.title: 旅行證件資訊
document.issurance: 請選擇旅行證件簽發國家/地區
document.description: 請列出旅客希望於旅途中所使用的旅行證件，閣下亦可以加入多筆資料。
document.warning: 閣下必須塡寫至少一筆旅行證件資料。

searchBox.title: 查詢框
searchBox.description: 請輸入出發地及目的地城市，系統將會爲閣下推薦最適合的飛航路線。

placeholder.departure: 出發地IATA代碼或機場名稱（僅支援英語）
placeholder.destination: 目的地IATA代碼或機場名稱（僅支援英語）

searchBox.invalidInput: 請輸入正確的IATA代碼或機場名稱，並從選項列表中選取合適的機場。
